title: Deadly Class, Volume 10: Save Your Generation
description: A forgotten and misunderstood generation wedged between two monoliths struggles to find their place in a world that is wholly disinterested in them. Year-by-year, as their cynicism is proven the only rational perspective, as the elastic cushion of youth fades, our friends must face a worldwide pandemic made up of the evils that once seemed relegated only to the halls of Kings Dominion.Collects DEADLY CLASS #45-48
author: Rick Remender
